thread.title: BRIEF-Internap Says Entered Into Incremental And Third Amendment To Credit Agreement

title: BRIEF-Internap Says Entered Into Incremental And Third Amendment To Credit Agreement
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:23 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Internap Says Entered Into Incremental And Third Amendment To Credit Agreement Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Internap Corp: * INTERNAP SAYS ENTERED INTO INCREMENTAL AND THIRD AMENDMENT TO CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING * INTERNAP - AMENDMENT PROVIDES FOR NEW INCREMENTAL TERM LOAN FACILITY UNDER CREDIT AGREEMENT DATED AS OF APRIL 6, 2017 OF $135 MILLION * INTERNAP SAYS PROCEEDS OF INCREMENTAL TERM LOAN WERE USED TO COMPLETE SINGLEHOP ACQUISITION, AMONG OTHERS - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2FLcztL ) Further company coverage:
